name: Claps & Craps
description:
Alternate between Claps & Craps and use your magic bond to nuke your enemies!

Careful, you won't be able to roll far from your partner!

This game was made for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam by:

- Game Art : Thibaut Dannenmuller (artstation, twitter, instagram)

- Game Design : Hugo Koenig (twitter) & Basile Strang

- Programming : Romain Hitier & Axel Puzenat
